title: Keyboard fix for FIFA 13
description:
First of all, sry for bad english!

I have found the fix for keyboard!

With this file, you can use your arrow keys to move players! :)

I've spend days to figure out how can i fix this "global"-problem, and now i want to share with you all!

I've tested on win7 64bit....


How to "install"...

1; unzip

2; open c:users"your username"documentsfifa13 and replace/overwrite 

3; play the game, and use "alternate" config, but you can change pass,shoot,sprint, etc. 

4; seed!


note: if your user name contains special symbols, copy the unzipped file under the other userdocumentsfifa13 ;)
